Rapid breathing and a fast heart rate also may be signs of PE.",NHLBI,Deep Vein Thrombosis
How to diagnose Deep Vein Thrombosis ?,"Your doctor will diagnose deep vein thrombosis (DVT) based on your medical history, a physical exam, and test results. He or she will identify you
